Description: Scalable web application environment with VPC, ECS, RDS, S3, CloudFront, KMS encryption, Bastion Host, and CloudWatch monitoring in us-west-1

BastionInstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for bastion host

KeyName.Description: EC2 Key Pair for SSH access to bastion host (optional)

ContainerImage.Description: Docker container image for web application

ContainerPort.Description: Port number the container listens on

AlertEmail.Description: Email address for CloudWatch alarm notifications

Properties.Description: KMS key for S3 bucket encryption

CloudFrontOriginAccessIdentityConfig.Comment: Origin Access Identity for WebApp S3 bucket

DistributionConfig.Comment: CloudFront distribution for WebApp static content

Properties.GroupDescription: Security group for RDS database - allows MySQL access from ECS tasks only
Security group for Application Load Balancer - allows HTTP and HTTPS
Security group for ECS tasks - allows traffic from ALB
Security group for Bastion Host - allows SSH access

UserData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash
set -e
yum update -y
yum install -y amazon-ssm-agent
systemctl enable amazon-ssm-agent
systemctl start amazon-ssm-agent

Properties.AlarmDescription: Alarm when ECS service CPU exceeds 80%

BastionHostPublicIP.Description: Public IP address of the Bastion Host

DBSecretArn.Description: ARN of the Secrets Manager secret containing database credentials

SNSTopicArn.Description: ARN of the SNS topic for CloudWatch alarms
